mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Banner (ban_name, ban_img, ban_size, ban_bg_color, ban_location, ban_banner_link, ban_start_date, ban_end_date) VALUES (#{ban_name}, #{ban_img}, #{ban_size}, #{ban_bg_color}, #{ban_location}, #{ban_banner_link}, TO_DATE(#{ban_start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{ban_end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT c1.CATE1_NAME , c2.* FROM CATE1 c1 JOIN CATE2 c2 ON c1.CATE1_NO = c2.CATE1_NO WHERE c2.CATE2_NO = #{cate2_no}
mapper.update: update TB_COMMENT set content=#{content} where cno=#{cno}
